item.armageddon_mod.ancient_blueprint.de: §7Allow you to craft the Titan's Insigna !
item.armageddon_mod.arion_lore_scroll.de: §7§o"Arion, once a simple Illager from ancient times, became a great soldier during the Armageddon War. A formidable strategist and warrior, he transcended his humble status by defeating numerous Ancient Builders, therefore seizing the mystical power of the emeralds. Impressed by his strength and cunning, his peers appointed him as the Emerald Keeper, bestowing upon him ancient artifacts to perfect his mastery. He was even named Arion, Tyrant of the Emerald Wrath by his mates. And now, Arion guards this power, with ambitions matched only by his thirst for domination."
item.armageddon_mod.arion_treasurebag: §eArion, Tyrant of the Emerald Wrath Treasure Bag

item.armageddon_mod.bone_effigy.descript: §7If you are below §950% HP §7, applies §9Resistance II (15 seconds).
item.armageddon_mod.bringer_of_doom_lore: §7§o"A mysterious being from a forgotten plane of existence, the Bringer of Doom serves as the harbinger of the apocalypse. Its presence heralds the awakening of Khyros and the arrival of the Three Calamities. Tasked with preparing the world for its inevitable fall, it spreads despair and chaos wherever it treads, forcing mortals to confront their own fragility. Though it serves Khyros, its true allegiance remains shrouded in mystery. Some say it feeds on the destruction it creates; others believe it is a primordial force, as ancient as time itself. One thing is certain: wherever it walks, hope fades."

§7Randomly strikes a lightning on the target
item.armageddon_mod.broken_sword_ofthe_e: §7Right click on block to discover its hidden powers

item.armageddon_mod.charm_of_the_sea.des: §7Gains a blessing from the sea granting you the §9Dolphin Grace §7and §9Conduit Power §7effects
item.armageddon_mod.cinder_hand.descript: §7When worn and an entity is hit :
item.armageddon_mod.cleaver_of_the_starv: §7Steal your enemies's food and slow them!
item.armageddon_mod.cosmos_shard.descrip: §7"A fragment of crystallized starlight, torn from the fabric of space itself."
item.armageddon_mod.dragons_fang.descrip: §7Shoots a Dragon Fireball from your sword
item.armageddon_mod.dying_star.descripti: §7"Forged from the embers of a collapsing sun, it pulses with the wrath of a star’s final breath."
item.armageddon_mod.echoing_scrap.descri: §7"Metal fragments imbued with ancient resonances, as if the echoes of broken weapons and forgotten battles still whisper through them."
item.armageddon_mod.eclipsium_alloy.desc: §7“Forged during the convergence of three great powers, bound by Doom Powder. Its darkened sheen swallows the light like an eternal eclipse, and its power transcends time and space.”
item.armageddon_mod.eclipsium_edge.descr: §7Gains a powerful buff for §915 seconds§7 that will reduce your enemies to ashes with each successive hit.
item.armageddon_mod.eclipsium_reaper.des: §7Gains a powerful buff for §915 seconds§7 that will reduce your enemies to ashes with each successive hit.
item.armageddon_mod.elder_guardian_lore_: §7§o"The Elder Guardian was employed by the Ancient Builders to protect their underwater monuments, where invaluable knowledge and treasures were hidden. Forged in the magic of the oceans, it is far more intelligent and powerful than ordinary Guardians. Its skin is as tough as prismarine blocks, and its gaze can paralyze or destroy any threat. As the Ancients mysteriously vanished, the Elder Guardian continued its watch, unwavering, ready to defend these forgotten citadels of the deep against any intruder..."
item.armageddon_mod.eldorath_lore_scroll: §7§o"The Ancient Builders were simply the most advanced form of life in ancient times. They mastered all ores, all resources, and more: a form of magic that, while not highly advanced, was powerful enough to create entities like the Wither. They had understood how to survive in this world, and their constructions today stand as remnants of their intelligence. Unfortunately for them, during the Armageddon War, they were forced into hiding, particularly in the Nether and the End. Their fallen souls adapted, transforming into Endermen or Piglins, desperately trying to return to the Overworld at any cost. Eldorath, however, managed to escape all of this, and thanks to his boundless knowledge, he proclaimed himself the Diamond Keeper, the guardian of the Overworld...""
item.armageddon_mod.elvenite_bell.descri: §7Allows you to §9Stun §7enemies randomly, but very rarely §9(5% chance)
§7Releases a §9defensive shockwave §7upon taking damage that will §9Stun §7the ennemies.-Has a 40 seconds cooldown.
item.armageddon_mod.elvenite_ingot.descr: §7"The oldest ore of the Overworld kept by the Ancients Builders"
item.armageddon_mod.elvenite_paladin_lor: §7§o"The Elvenite Paladin was once a mighty automaton, crafted by the Ancient Builders to protect their village from external threats. Unlike today’s iron golems, it was forged from Elvenite, a legendary material that radiates mystical energy. This paladin did not merely defend; it watched over the ancient Builders' secrets, guarding lost knowledge and forgotten artifacts. Over time, its mission became eternal, continuing to protect the Builders' ruins, though they vanished long ago. It remains ever-vigilant, ready to face any threat that may arise."
item.armageddon_mod.emerald_totem.descri: §7Summon Arion, Tyrant of the Emerald Wrath!
item.armageddon_mod.ender_dragon_lore_sc: §7§o"Once, the Ender Dragon was Khyros' war hound, spreading destruction under his orders. After the Great War, it was exiled to the End, a cold and empty dimension, destined to guard this realm for eternity. Condemned to remain a captive of the End, it wandered through the void, a prisoner of a curse that prevented it from regaining its freedom. Its death, at the hands of a hero, was not merely a defeat, but a liberation. Freed from its eternal bondage, the Ender Dragon finally found peace in death...""
item.armageddon_mod.fiery_wither_skull.d: §7Summon Zoranth, The Forgotten One when in the Nether !
item.armageddon_mod.fork_of_lamentations: §7Throws a serie of forks that pierces through the ennemies and stuns them.
item.armageddon_mod.gemwoven_fragment.de: §7§o"An ancient artifact woven from fragments of rare gems, imbued with the power of forgotten lands. It is said to hold the essence of battles past and grants strength and protection to those who wield it."
item.armageddon_mod.glowbug_lantern.desc: §7When your off-hand is empty, gives you §91 Torch §7every §910 seconds!
item.armageddon_mod.gobelin_lord_lore_sc: §7§o"Being a member of the ancient faction of goblins that once ruled over gold, the Goblin Lord was one of the few survivors after the total annihilation of his clan. Once known for his cowardly nature, he took advantage of the chaos to self-proclaim himself as the lord and guardian of gold. His boundless ambition allowed him to seize not only the treasures of his fallen people but also those of the golden depths. After demonstrating his strength and determination to protect gold at all costs, he too will ultimately fail..."
item.armageddon_mod.gravity_normalizer.d: §7Allows you to not be pushed by §9Gravity.
item.armageddon_mod.great_idol_of_the_di: §7Allow the §eDivine Retribution §7effect to build up even faster

item.armageddon_mod.indomita_furia.descr: §7§o"The old texts warn: 'Let none take up this steel lightly, for it shall wound the weak of heart and reward only those who persist through agony.'"

item.armageddon_mod.iron_colossus_arm.de: §7Made of the arm of the fallen Iron Colossus
§8Allow the player to stun an entity for 1s
item.armageddon_mod.iron_colossus_lore_s: §7§o"The Iron Colossus was an ancient golem, far more powerful than those of modern times. It was built by the Ancients Builders, its body adorned with streams of pure iron, and an allium flower had even grown on its head, a symbol of life within the metal. Forged to protect, it sustained heavy damage during The Armageddon War. In a final desperate act, it was designated as the Iron Keeper, the guardian of iron, to ensure that no one would wield its power. Unfortunately, it failed, condemned to wander the depths, guarding the secrets it could not defend."
item.armageddon_mod.lament_of_khyros.des: §7Throws a spear that pierces through the ennemies and stuns them.
item.armageddon_mod.lance_of_the_veil.de: §7The most powerful flame that last forever
§7Inflict Amaterasu, Slowness and Darkness to the entities around you
item.armageddon_mod.life_necklace.descri: §7If you are below §950% HP §7, releases a §9Life Explosion §7dealing damage to the enemies while healing yourself.
§7When the explosion occurs, inflicts §9Hemorrhage §7to your enemies.
§7For §910 seconds §7you'll make more damages and set entities around you on fire during each hit.
§7§o"Once a warrior without equal, Nyxaris carved his legend in blood and steel, earning the revered title of Legendary Hero. Yet, glory was fleeting, and the weight of his own legacy became a burden. Drawn to a force beyond mortal comprehension, he sought Khyros, not as a foe, but as a master. Admiration turned to devotion, and devotion to surrender. His spear, once wielded for honor and justice, was now an extension of the End’s will. No longer a man, but a shadow, he shed his identity and embraced oblivion, becoming the Veil of Oblivion, eternally bound to the Harbinger’s fate. Yet, within the abyss, a fragment of his former self lingers—a whisper drowned beneath the call of Armageddon. But hesitation is a luxury he no longer possesses."

item.armageddon_mod.sanghor_lord_of_bloo: §7§o"Long before Khyros emerged, Sanghor wandered the nascent ages of this world. A mage of the first times, he experimented with life and death, shaping the very fabric of existence with forbidden knowledge. His secret? Mastery over blood itself—the essence of life and destiny.  As with all beings of great power, he eventually crossed paths with Khyros. Faced with a superior force, Sanghor forged a pact, trading a part of his freedom for renewed power and unmatched longevity. This pact transformed him into a colossal being: his wings appeared, black as night, and his tears became blood, a symbol of both his power and his damnation.  Now he wanders between shadow and light, mourning his past and watching the world with the wisdom and melancholy of one who has tasted the secrets of life itself."
item.armageddon_mod.sanguir.description_: §7Has a §930% §7chance to damage the entities next to your target.
item.armageddon_mod.scalding_silence.des: §7Covers you in ashes and grants you §93 §7devastating inferno hits.

item.armageddon_mod.spirit_of_despair.de: §7§oThe cold soul of death, an eternal silence where life finds no refuge.
item.armageddon_mod.spiritof_chaos.descr: §7§oThe essence of pure chaos, distorted and uncontrollable, shattering the order of worlds.
item.armageddon_mod.spiritof_dread.descr: §7§oA soul consumed by eternal fear, witnessing the unspoken terrors of the past.

§7Shoots a serie of powerful Abyssal Balls in front of you that slow your ennemies and blind them.
item.armageddon_mod.the_annihilation.des: §7Combine the power of §9Fire §7and §9VoidFlame §7to burn your enemies.
§7A devastating dash that ignites Void Flame and Chaos State, exploding after a brief delay to annihilate nearby foes.
item.armageddon_mod.the_chaos_lore_scrol: §7§o"Wrought from the unbridled malice of Khyros, The Chaos was summoned as the Second Calamity, a vessel of relentless destruction forged from a shard of his cataclysmic essence. Its arrival is heralded by skies ablaze with unnatural fire and the panicked cries of those who witness its coming. Chaos obeys no law, no master — not even Khyros himself — for it was made to unbind the world's order, to fracture reason, and to drown the realms in madness. Its demonic laughter is a grim omen, for wherever it treads, kingdoms fall to ruin, and brother turns against brother. It craves nothing but to watch the world collapse in a tide of pure, unrelenting anarchy."
item.armageddon_mod.the_chaosphere_blade: §7Applict a random debuff to the target
§7In exchange for your health, unleash a devastating slash of chaos
item.armageddon_mod.the_discord_lore_scr: §7§o"Fashioned by Khyros as the Fourth Calamity, The Discord was born not of strength, but of treachery. A fragment of his deceitful will given form, she whispers through the winds, corrupting minds and dividing hearts. Where her influence spreads, friendships wither, loyalties fracture, and kingdoms crumble without a single blow struck. She is the unseen force that poisons unity, turning brother against brother, and leader against kin. Her presence is more devastating than any blade or spell, for she causes the world to collapse from within, ensuring that when ruin comes, none will stand together to face it."
item.armageddon_mod.the_duskfire_blade.d: §7Burn the ennemies with Amaterasu, slow them and strike lighning!
item.armageddon_mod.the_exsanguination.d: §7Releases a burst of continual sanguine damage at your position.
item.armageddon_mod.the_eye_of_the_sun.d: §7Deals 25 damages in a 16 blocks zone to all ennemies
item.armageddon_mod.the_famine_lore_scro: §7§o"Born from the abyssal will of Khyros, The Famine was forged as the first of the Calamities — a living vessel for a fragment of his boundless, ruinous power. Created to rend the balance of life itself, she is the creeping shadow of starvation, devouring harvests, beasts, and souls alike. Where she walks, the land rots, and a hunger without end consumes all. Khyros did not craft her for conquest, but for torment — to wither the world’s strength, sow despair, and prepare the realm for his final ascension. She is not merely a beast, but a curse incarnate, a herald of a world undone by its creator’s hand."
item.armageddon_mod.the_holy_sword.descr: §7Ignite the targets infinitely strike a lightning on the entities!
item.armageddon_mod.the_hungery_axe.desc: §7 §7Take a bite out of the tool to nourish yourself.

item.armageddon_mod.tinkerers_accesory_t: §7Uses to combine Accesories in the §9Smithing Table
item.armageddon_mod.true_aqua_tide.descr: §7Launches ennemies into the air and drow them dealing 10 damages
item.armageddon_mod.true_helionite_sword: §7Burn the ennemies, slow them and strike lighning!
item.armageddon_mod.ultimate_sword_of_th: §7Right click on block to discover its hidden powers
§7Performs a blazing dash, setting nearby enemies on fire
§7Sets the ennemies on fire for 10 seconds
§7Has a chance to spawn a Grass Sword projectile
§7Fire 3 grass swords that goes through enemies and poison them!
§7Frozes ennemies around you for 7.5 seconds and deals 15 damages
§7Strikes a bunch of lightnings on the ennemies around you
§7Randomly strikes a lightning on the target
item.armageddon_mod.umbral_sun.descripti: §7"A corrupted solar essence, where light and shadow have become one."
§7§o"Vaedric was once a valiant soldier, a hero who dared to challenge the Ender Dragon and clash with Khyros himself. But his courage came at a price. After weakening the Ender Dragon, Khyros, merciless and cruel, condemned him to an endless fall into the depths of the Void. There, he slowly lost his humanity, his body warped by the darkness. He reemerged much later, part Enderman, a specter haunted by his failure, unable to distinguish friend from foe. Now, he roams the shadows, consumed by rage and despair."
item.armageddon_mod.vampiric_talisman.de: §7But each critical hit inflicted restores §90.5 Heart.
item.armageddon_mod.vitalis_pearl.descri: §7"A pearl radiating with primordial energy, the fusion of all elements that govern this world."
item.armageddon_mod.void_fragment.descri: §7Allow you to craft the Wanderer's Fallen Shard !
item.armageddon_mod.warden_lore_scroll.d: §7§o"The Warden, born from the mistakes of the Ancient Builders, watches over the Deep Dark, a shadowy realm filled with mystical energy. Created to protect the ruins and secrets of forgotten civilizations, it serves as both guardian and punisher, hunting down those who venture too close to its forbidden domains. Blind yet highly sensitive to vibrations, it embodies the wrath of the ancient powers it keeps imprisoned. Its presence is a reminder that some forces should never be awakened, and that certain secrets must remain buried in eternal darkness."
item.armageddon_mod.wither_lore_swroll.d: §7§o"The Wither was created by the Ancient Builders as an ultimate weapon during the Armageddon War. In a moment of desperation, they summoned this creature through various forbidden rituals, hoping it would annihilate their enemies. Its power was simply immense. Although they tried to tame it, the Wither was far too strong, and its thirst for destruction prevailed. It was too late... After being defeated in a fierce battle, it was shattered into pieces and scattered across the most dangerous place known at the time: the Nether, which was discovered on that occasion. Nowadays, the Wither waits for someone daring enough to re-summon it, seeking revenge on the world...  "
item.armageddon_mod.wither_skull_no.desc: §7Allow you to craft the Fiery Wither Skull !
item.armageddon_mod.withered_bone_effigy: §7If you are below §950% HP §7, applies §9Resistance II (15 seconds) and explodes into a Withred Cloud.
§7Shoots a bunch of §9Withered Arrows §7in front of you
item.armageddon_mod.withered_splintered_: §7"A darkish bone powder infused with magic and obtained by right clicking on a Wither Rose a Splintered Bone"
item.armageddon_mod.woe_splitter.descrip: §7Inflicts §cChaos State §7to every ennemies arround you and slow them.
item.armageddon_mod.yugure.description_3: §7Dashes forward with the force of collapsing stars, slashing everything in your path.
item.armageddon_mod.yugure.description_7: §7A sudden burst of collapsing starlight launches the target skyward before gravity claims them back §9(5% chance)
§7§o"Once an explorer among the Ancient Builders, Zoranth was sent after the Armageddon War to the Nether, a land still scarcely explored at that time despite the power of his people. His mission was to find the villagers who had been condemned to wander in this dimension, forced to become piglins or other creatures. Unfortunately, Zoranth and his troupe did not escape this fate. After a few years, the portal closed, likely deliberately. It took only a few days for Zoranth's troupe to transform... Yet, he managed to evade this fate, consumed instead by the rage of betrayal and a desire for revenge, even though, unbeknownst to him, his people had already perished...""
item.armageddon_mod.zoranth_newborn_of_t: §7§o"After his defeat in the Nether at your hands, Zoranth, consumed by rage and humiliation, knelt before Khyros, pleading for a power that would allow him to reclaim his fate. In exchange for his flesh, his face, and even his convictions, he was granted the essence of the sun itself—an eternal flame burning within his grasp. Stripped of his former humanity, he became nothing more than an avatar of destruction, guided by blind vengeance. But this power was nothing more than a cruel illusion… When defeat struck him one final time, the scorching curse that bound him was extinguished, and at last, Zoranth found freedom."
§eZoranth, Newborn of the Zenith Spawn Egg
§eZoranth, Newborn of the Zenith Treasure Bag
item.armageddon_mod.zoranths_hand.descri: §7When worn and an entity is hit :
§925% chance to inflict Wither II (5 seconds)
